texto: assessment for the purpose of process capability determination. It addresses process capability determination in both straightforward situations and in more complex situations involving, for example, future capability. The guidance on conducting process capability determination is applicable either for use within an organization to determine its own capability, or by an acquirer to determine the capability of a (potential) supplier. Part 9 (normative) is a consolidated vocabulary of all terms specifically defined for the purposes of ISO/IEC TR 15504.
